trends: There have been 4 other sightings in La Habra
There were no other sightings in La Habra on or around June 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsmy 17 yr old son & his friend came to get me about the strange light. they said they had seen it the night before too. when i saw it it was hovering, not moving. we grabed binoculars. the light on the left was blue-ish the light on the right was red. the lights were not blinking. the light was in the SE horizon. the it took off really fast & ended up in the western horizon. the sped off south & disappeared. about 30 seconds later it reappeared to the south of us. it sped to the south west very fast again & then stopped in one spot for about 20-30 seconds. then it sped off to the south & disappeaed again.
Summary: so lights hovering. took off fast stop hover take oof in other direction. disappear then reappear. several times
